wikipedia_page.main: Mallory Franklin (born 19 June 1994) is a British slalom canoeist who has competed internationally since 2009.She won silver at the 2020 Summer Olympics in the Women's C1 event.Franklin has won eleven medals in total at the ICF Canoe Slalom World Championships with five golds (C1: 2017, C1 team: 2017, 2018, K1 team: 2019, 2021), five silvers (C1: 2013, 2014, 2018, 2021; K1: 2018) and a bronze (K1 team: 2018). She has also won thirteen medals at the European Championships (6 golds, 5 silvers and 2 bronzes).Franklin won the overall World Cup title in the C1 class in 2016.
